ie.gmit.sw

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyServer, ServerImpl

    public interface Server
    Server is an interface that states what a server should do. This is written specific for the server this application uses. The server acts as a facade(?) in the way it fully composes each of the other interfaces and is used as a single place to do all the servery business. This seemed like it was the best idea because there are many classes and refrain from making references to each other within the classes, I decided to use this class to connect everything.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addDocument()
      Is the class responsible for delegating the work to the database to add a document.
      boolean authenticate(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String firstLine)
      Used as error handling that returns true if the title and firstLine of the document exists.
      double compareSim()
      Is the class responsible for delegating the work to the SimilarityCalculator to calculate the similarity of the document parsed in processDocument() against all other documents.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> displayDocument()
      Is the class responsible for returning the set of words that was processed by readDocument
      void finish()
      A method of stopping the server mainly used for proxy to destroy a session.
      double process(java.lang.String title, java.io.BufferedReader br, HashingMethod hashingMethod)
      This method is responsible for calling all the other messages in order, this is to allow the client to simply call Process instead of all of the commands above (except authenticate).
      void processDocument(HashingMethod hashingMethod)
      Is the class responsible for delegating work to the Shingleator and Hashing class to shingle and hash the document.
      void readDocument(java.lang.String title, java.io.BufferedReader br)
      Is the class responsible for delegating work to the Documentor to parse the file.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        boolean authenticate(java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String firstLine)
        Used as error handling that returns true if the title and firstLine of the document exists. This is used for the proxy mainly to ensure that the server does not start creating documents if there is no valid input.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the document
        firstLine - a BufferedReader of the first line of the document
        Returns:
        true if title and firstLine exist, false if title and firstLine don't exist

      • readDocument

        void readDocument(java.lang.String title,
                  java.io.BufferedReader br)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Is the class responsible for delegating work to the Documentor to parse the file.
        Parameters:
        title - Used to add a title to document to be processed and stored
        br - Used to add content to the document to be processed and stored
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File operations

      • processDocument

        void processDocument(HashingMethod hashingMethod)
        Is the class responsible for delegating work to the Shingleator and Hashing class to shingle and hash the document.
        Parameters:
        hashingMethod - An enum to state which hashing method to use.

      • displayDocument

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> displayDocument()
        Is the class responsible for returning the set of words that was processed by readDocument
        Returns:
        The list of words

      • addDocument

        boolean addDocument()
        Is the class responsible for delegating the work to the database to add a document.
        Returns:
        True if document was added successfully and false if unsuccessfully.

      • compareSim

        double compareSim()
        Is the class responsible for delegating the work to the SimilarityCalculator to calculate the similarity of the document parsed in processDocument() against all other documents.
        Returns:
        A value of 0-1 * 100 to represent the precentile of similarity.

      • finish

        void finish()
        A method of stopping the server mainly used for proxy to destroy a session.

      • process

        double process(java.lang.String title,
               java.io.BufferedReader br,
               HashingMethod hashingMethod)
        throws java.io.IOException
        This method is responsible for calling all the other messages in order, this is to allow the client to simply call Process instead of all of the commands above (except authenticate). Seemed like a better way of doing things plus it makes this server look more like a facade.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the document
        br - BufferedReader containing the contents of the document
        hashingMethod - Enum to distinguish what hashingMethod to use
        Returns:
        A value of 0-1 * 100 to represent the precentile of similarity.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - For File operations
